FuncDef:
The pppoe-server ac-name command configures a name for a PPPoE server.
The undo pppoe-server ac-name command deletes a name configured for a PPPoE server.
By default, the name of a PPPoE server is the device's host name.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a name for a PPPoE server.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
PPPoE uses the client/server model. A PPPoE client initiates a connection request to a PPPoE server. After a session is established, the PPPoE server provides access control and authentication for the PPPoE client. To help clients identify a PPPoE server, run the pppoe-server ac-name command to configure a name for a PPPoE server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
